Read all program files from a configuration

Source: R/program-read.R
program_read_all.Rd

Convenience wrapper that reads all program files specified in a alccdf_program_config object and returns them as a named list.

Usage

program_read_all(config)

Arguments

config

An alccdf_program_config object created by program_config

Value

A named list of alccdf_program_raw objects, one per available type.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
cfg <- program_config(
  snapshot_date = "2025-06-11",
  center_path   = "data/Centers.xlsx",
  home_path     = "data/FamilyHomes.xlsx"
)
raw_list <- program_read_all(cfg)
names(raw_list)
} # }
